text.p: Corriente - (built 1995) 158,178 dwt del Cont end June trip via Brazil redel Japan $17,450 daily K Line (reported).
Ioannis 2 - (built 1982) 77,300 dwt 13 on 39 plus 2.5 del Dunkirk ppt trip two or three laden legs Atlantic trading redel Skaw-Cape Passero $8,500 daily Seamar.
Bunga Saga Tiga - (built 1994) 72,338 dwt del Gresik early June trip via Port Hedland redel Bin Qasim $10,750 daily Pan Ocean.
Stalo - (built 1995) 73,034 dwt 14 on 32 plus 2 del Rotterdam retroactive 21/5 trip ECSA r/v redel Skaw-Cape Passero $10,000 daily Oldendorff.
Torm Marta - (built 1997) 69,638 dwt del USG ppt-31/5 trip Far East $12,250 daily and low $200,000 bb Samsun.
Anangel Progress - (built 1989) 69,406 dwt 14 on 35 plus 2 del Recalada 5-10/6 trip Taiwan $12,000 daily plus $225,000 bb Safmarine.
Arkas - (built 1988) 64,994 dwt 13 on 34 plus 1.5 del Japan ppt trip Indonesia r/v $8,800 daily Taiheiyo.

Aifanourias - (built 1975) 64,050 dwt 12.5 on 37 plus 3 del Rotterdam in direct continuation retroactive 19/5 trip one or two laden legs redel Skaw-Cape Passero range $7,500 daily Marifran (reported).
Stone Gemini - (built 1980) 61,942 dwt del passing Muscat outbound early June trip via Richards Bay redel Taiwan high $8,000 daily Samsun.
Ikan Sepat - (built 1984) 28,053 dwt 13-13.5 on 22 plus 2 del Japan end May trip Nopac r/v $7,000 daily Tokai.
C.Filyos - (built 1990) 72,136 dwt del USG 2-10/6 trip Japan $12,000 daily plus $200,000 bb Cho Yang (reported).
Samjohn Light - (built 1994) 71,756 dwt 14 on 28.5 plus 0.5 del Japan ppt trip via Roberts Bank redel UK $7,300 daily BSC.
Silver Star - (built 1993) 69,235 dwt 14 on 32 plus 0.2 del Rizhao 1-10/6 trip Japan $9,750 daily plus $15,000 bb Daiichi.
Stamos - (built 1985) 63,865 dwt 13.5 on 30 del USWC 29/5-5/6 trip Cont approx. $7,000 daily $100,000 bb Aimcor.
Iolcos Legend - (built 1980) 35,295 dwt del USG end May trip Morocco $8,500 daily Dreyfus.
Maraki - (built 1979) 24,586 dwt del Khanom ppt trip Philippines $6,000 daily Pearl.
